name: NSCandidateListTouchBarItemDelegate
desc: A set of methods that a candidate list item delegate uses to enable selection state and list visibility.

items.name: func candidateListTouchBarItem(NSCandidateListTouchBarItem<AnyObject>, beginSelectingCandidateAt: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has started touching one of the candidates in the candidate list item.

items.name: func candidateListTouchBarItem(NSCandidateListTouchBarItem<AnyObject>, changeSelectionFromCandidateAt: Int, to: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that user has moved from touching one candidate in the candidate list item to another.

items.name: func candidateListTouchBarItem(NSCandidateListTouchBarItem<AnyObject>, endSelectingCandidateAt: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a user has stopped touching candidates in the candidate list item.

items.name: func candidateListTouchBarItem(NSCandidateListTouchBarItem<AnyObject>, changedCandidateListVisibility: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the visibility of the candidate list has changed.
